thread.title: Tiffanie Hiibner Joins The Shipyard As Chief Client Officer

author: cnbc.com
title: Tiffanie Hiibner Joins The Shipyard As Chief Client Officer
text:
COLUMBUS, Ohio, The Shipyard announces today the appointment of Tiffanie Hiibner as Chief Client Officer, a new role focused on delivering value with extraordinary client service. Hiibner was most recently Senior Vice President, Marketing Services at Nationwide.
The Shipyard's CEO Rick Milenthal comments: "We look forward to Tiffanie's leadership as we accelerate our promise of creating the world's first marketing engineering agency. Her business acumen and marketing expertise will help us continue to grow our clients' businesses and deliver brand inspiration that is valuable, compelling and effective."
Hiibner assumes an executive-level role on all accounts and is charged with cultivating strategic relationships with all clients to develop insights, strategies and solutions for integrated marketing success.
"Tiffanie has a stellar track record at developing and implementing marketing activities that consistently deliver results. She also has an intuitive gift and talent for creating collaborative environments where curiosity can thrive," adds Todd Cameron, Chief Operating Officer at The Shipyard.
The Shipyard has experienced exponential growth since its inception in 2013 and is creating digital transformation for some of the world's most significant brands.
Hiibner adds: "I have been fortunate to be in leadership positions both on the agency and client side and have never seen anything like The Shipyard's value proposition. They are truly joining creativity and analytics together to become the most measurably effective agency in the industry. I'm excited to join the team."
About Tiffanie Hiibner:
Tiffanie currently serves as Chief Client Officer for The Shipyard. She also sits on the Board of Directors for the Huckleberry House.
Prior to her current role, Hiibner was SVP, Marketing Services at Nationwide. There she led the in-house agency consisting of account management, creative services, creative and digital production, production and delivery; and managed external agency relationships. Previous roles within Nationwide included leading brand and marketing strategy for Allied, Agribusiness, Private Client and Harleysville.
Over the span of her 20+ year career, Tiffanie held various leadership positions at top-tier marketing agencies such The Integer Group, 141 Worldwide and Draft Worldwide. She has an extensive history developing profitable, innovative and integrated marketing, advertising and sales promotion strategies for direct response, digital, radio, television, print, retail, event and shopper marketing campaigns. Past clients include Shell Lubricants, Scotts Miracle-Gro, Benjamin Moore Paints, Michelin, Maytag Appliances, Electrolux Appliances, Pella Windows, SC Johnson, M&M Mars, Sprint and McDonalds.
Tiffanie is a graduate of Syracuse University and resides in Powell, Ohio with her daughter, Ivy.
About The Shipyard
The Shipyard is a leading, independent marketing consultancy and the world's first "marketing engineering" agency. The company was founded in 2013 by industry veteran Rick Milenthal, who was CEO of the leading national digital agency, Engauge, now a part of Publicis Groupe; and marketing technology pioneer, Ben Clarke, who was CEO of People To My Site.
